Reason: The configuration 'hinted_handoff_throttle_in_kb' is classified as performance-sensitive. This is because the configuration directly impacts the rate at which hints are delivered in the system, controlling the amount of data transferred per second. This control mechanism is crucial for preventing overload on receiving nodes and ensuring efficient hint delivery. The configuration involves time-extensive operations related to throttling the delivery rate, which can lead to notable performance variations at the system level. Therefore, it is considered performance-sensitive.
